source_data.description: English prepositions, in this course we will explore the essential role of prepositions in forming clear and grammatically correct sentences. Prepositions are small yet powerful words that indicate relationships between nouns, pronouns, and other elements in a sentence. This course will cover prepositions of time, place, movement, direction, and manner, helping you understand their correct usage. We will also discuss common prepositional phrases, collocations, and idiomatic expressions to enhance fluency. Through practical examples, exercises, and real-life applications, you will gain confidence in using prepositions accurately in writing and speech. Avoid common mistakes, master tricky prepositions, and improve your English communication skills. Whether you’re a beginner or an advanced learner, this course provides a structured approach to mastering prepositions in everyday and professional English. EnglishAnyone
